overview_of_class: This course embraces all major literary works of the 10th century through the 17th, in the context of history and visual arts. The course touches upon various genres: Epic (from the oral ballads to Slovo o polku Igoreve); hagiography (lives [biographies] of the saints); chronicles (from Povest' vremennykch let to Skazanie o Mamaevom poboishche); autobiography (Zhitie protopopa Avvakuma); epistolary (from Pouchenie Vladimira Monomakcha to the letters of Ivan the Terrible to Prince Kurbsky) et al.
name: Studies in Old Russian Literature
title: WCAS SLAVIC 430-0-1 Studies in Old Russian Literature

descriptions.name: Overview of class

subject: SLAVIC
